Backdrop.name: ItemTrig_UITemplate_BackgroundFade
Backdrop.OnInitialized: local offset = ZO_DEFAULT_BACKDROP_ANCHOR_OFFSET + 2 local thick = 2 local fill = GetControl(self, "Fill") local edge = GetControl(self, "Edge") local vEdgeTop = VERTEX_POINTS_TOPLEFT + VERTEX_POINTS_TOPRIGHT local vEdgeBot = VERTEX_POINTS_BOTTOMLEFT + VERTEX_POINTS_BOTTOMRIGHT do local parent = self:GetParent() self:SetAnchor(TOPLEFT, parent, TOPLEFT, -offset, -offset) self:SetAnchor(BOTTOMRIGHT, parent, BOTTOMRIGHT, offset, offset) end do local r, g, b, a = self:GetCenterColor() fill:SetDrawLevel(-1) fill:SetVertexColors(vEdgeTop, r, g, b, 1) fill:SetVertexColors(vEdgeBot, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 1) fill:SetBlendMode(TEX_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA) fill:ClearAnchors() fill:SetAnchor(TOPLEFT, self, TOPLEFT, thick, thick) fill:SetAnchor(BOTTOMRIGHT, self, BOTTOMRIGHT, -thick, -thick) end do local r, g, b, a = 140/255, 140/255, 140/255, 0.5 edge:SetDrawLevel(-2) edge:SetVertexColors(vEdgeTop, r, g, b, 1) edge:SetVertexColors(vEdgeBot, r, g, b, 1) edge:SetBlendMode(TEX_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA) end
